title: Megyn Kelly breaks silence after rumor claims she aided Candace Owens in Erika Kirk Bride of Charlie series
summary_full: Megyn Kelly strongly denied rumors that she helped Candace Owens produce the Bride of Charlie series about Erika Kirk. After an X user claimed she screened the series and offered legal advice, Kelly responded, calling the allegation false and the poster a “filthy liar.” She also previously said she has criticized Owens many times and does not comment on every controversy.
